mapper.select: SELECT distinct syspg.name, syspg.id, syspg.is_final, syspg.PARENT_ID, syspg.MENU_CODE FROM sys_user sur LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sysuro ON sur.id = sysuro.sys_user_id LEFT JOIN SYS_ROLE_PERMISSION sysrp on sysrp.SYS_ROLE_ID= sysuro.SYS_ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN sys_permission sysp ON sysp.id = sysrp.SYS_PERMISSION_ID LEFT JOIN sys_permission_group syspg ON syspg.id = sysp.sys_permission_group_id WHERE sur.id = #{id} AND sysrp.Status = 1 AND sysuro.status = 1 AND syspg.status = 1 AND sysp.status = 1

SELECT distinct sysp.name, sysp.id, sysp.CODE, sysp.SYS_PERMISSION_GROUP_ID, sysp.IS_FINAL FROM sys_user sur LEFT JOIN sys_user_role_organization sysuro ON sur.id = sysuro.sys_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_organization sysro ON sysro.id = sysuro.sys_role_organization_id left join SYS_ROLE_PERMISSION sysrp on sysrp.SYS_ROLE_ID= sysro.SYS_ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN sys_permission sysp ON sysp.id = sysrp.SYS_PERMISSION_ID LEFT JOIN sys_permission_group syspg ON syspg.id = sysp.sys_permission_group_id WHERE sur.id = #{id} AND sysuro.status = 1 AND syspg.status = 1 AND sysp.status = 1
